languages.text: {n}При попытке изучить текст, который когитатор выводит на экраны, у вас начинает раскалываться голова. Вы отводите взгляд, но светящиеся квадраты, словно отпечатавшись на сетчатке, еще плянут какое-то время перед глазами.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}При попытке изучить текст, который когитатор выводит на экраны, у вас начинает раскалываться голова. Вы отводите взгляд, но светящиеся квадраты, словно отпечатавшись на сетчатке, еще плянут какое-то время перед глазами.{/n}

languages.text: {n}When you attempt to study the text being displayed on the screens, your head begins to swim. You look away, but the glowing squares continue to dance before your eyes, as though they have been burned into your retinas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}При попытке изучить текст, который когитатор выводит на экраны, у вас начинает раскалываться голова. Вы отводите взгляд, но светящиеся квадраты, словно отпечатавшись на сетчатке, еще плянут какое-то время перед глазами.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}When you attempt to study the text being displayed on the screens, your head begins to swim. You look away, but the glowing squares continue to dance before your eyes, as though they have been burned into your retinas.{/n}

{n}When you attempt to study the text being displayed on the screens, your head begins to swim. You look away, but the glowing squares continue to dance before your eyes, as though they have been burned into your retinas.{/n}

{n}When you attempt to study the text being displayed on the screens, your head begins to swim. You look away, but the glowing squares continue to dance before your eyes, as though they have been burned into your retinas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}当你打算研究屏幕上显示的文字时，突然感觉天旋地转。你转过了头，但那些发光的方块依然在你眼前舞动，仿佛被烙在了你的视网膜上一样。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}When you attempt to study the text being displayed on the screens, your head begins to swim. You look away, but the glowing squares continue to dance before your eyes, as though they have been burned into your retinas.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}当你打算研究屏幕上显示的文字时，突然感觉天旋地转。你转过了头，但那些发光的方块依然在你眼前舞动，仿佛被烙在了你的视网膜上一样。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cuando intentas estudiar el texto de las pantallas, empiezas a marearte. Apartas la mirada, pero los cuadrados brillantes siguen bailando ante tus ojos, como si se hubieran grabado en tus retinas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}When you attempt to study the text being displayed on the screens, your head begins to swim. You look away, but the glowing squares continue to dance before your eyes, as though they have been burned into your retinas.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cuando intentas estudiar el texto de las pantallas, empiezas a marearte. Apartas la mirada, pero los cuadrados brillantes siguen bailando ante tus ojos, como si se hubieran grabado en tus retinas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}スクリーンに表示される文字を見ようとすると、意識が泳ぎ始める。あなたは目をそらすが、まるで網膜に焼き付けられたかのように、光る四角が目の前で踊り続けていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}When you attempt to study the text being displayed on the screens, your head begins to swim. You look away, but the glowing squares continue to dance before your eyes, as though they have been burned into your retinas.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}スクリーンに表示される文字を見ようとすると、意識が泳ぎ始める。あなたは目をそらすが、まるで網膜に焼き付けられたかのように、光る四角が目の前で踊り続けていた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Als du versuchst, den Text auf den Bildschirmen zu erfassen, wird dir schwindelig. Du wendest den Blick ab, aber die leuchtenden Quadrate tanzen weiterhin vor deinen Augen, als hätten sie sich in deine Netzhäute eingebrannt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}When you attempt to study the text being displayed on the screens, your head begins to swim. You look away, but the glowing squares continue to dance before your eyes, as though they have been burned into your retinas.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Als du versuchst, den Text auf den Bildschirmen zu erfassen, wird dir schwindelig. Du wendest den Blick ab, aber die leuchtenden Quadrate tanzen weiterhin vor deinen Augen, als hätten sie sich in deine Netzhäute eingebrannt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Lorsque vous tentez d'étudier le texte affiché sur les écrans, vous êtes {mf|pris|prise} de vertiges. Vous détournez immédiatement le regard, mais les carrés lumineux continuent de danser devant vos yeux, comme s'ils avaient été brûlés sur vos rétines.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}When you attempt to study the text being displayed on the screens, your head begins to swim. You look away, but the glowing squares continue to dance before your eyes, as though they have been burned into your retinas.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Lorsque vous tentez d'étudier le texte affiché sur les écrans, vous êtes {mf|pris|prise} de vertiges. Vous détournez immédiatement le regard, mais les carrés lumineux continuent de danser devant vos yeux, comme s'ils avaient été brûlés sur vos rétines.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ekranların gösterdiği metni incelemeye çalıştığında dalıp gidiyorsun. Bakışlarını çeksen de parlayan kareler, âdeta retinalarına kazınmışçasına gözlerinin önünde raks ediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}When you attempt to study the text being displayed on the screens, your head begins to swim. You look away, but the glowing squares continue to dance before your eyes, as though they have been burned into your retinas.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ekranların gösterdiği metni incelemeye çalıştığında dalıp gidiyorsun. Bakışlarını çeksen de parlayan kareler, âdeta retinalarına kazınmışçasına gözlerinin önünde raks ediyor.{/n}
